00028    :public wxWindowAccessible
00029 #endif

00031 public:
00032    TrackPanelAx(wxWindow * window);
00033    virtual ~ TrackPanelAx();
00034 
00035    // Returns currently focused track or first one if none focused
00036    Track *GetFocus();
00037 
00038    // Changes focus to a specified track
00039    void SetFocus( Track *track );
00040 
00041    // Returns TRUE if passed track has the focus
00042    bool IsFocused( Track *track );
00043 
00044 #if wxUSE_ACCESSIBILITY
00045    // Retrieves the address of an IDispatch interface for the specified child.
00046    // All objects must support this property.
00047    virtual wxAccStatus GetChild( int childId, wxAccessible** child );
00048 
00049    // Gets the number of children.
00050    virtual wxAccStatus GetChildCount(int* childCount);
00051 
00052    // Gets the default action for this object (0) or > 0 (the action for a child).
00053    // Return wxACC_OK even if there is no action. actionName is the action, or the empty
00054    // string if there is no action.
00055    // The retrieved string describes the action that is performed on an object,
00056    // not what the object does as a result. For example, a toolbar button that prints
00057    // a document has a default action of "Press" rather than "Prints the current document."
00058    virtual wxAccStatus GetDefaultAction( int childId, wxString *actionName );
00059 
00060    // Returns the description for this object or a child.
00061    virtual wxAccStatus GetDescription( int childId, wxString *description );
00062 
00063    // Gets the window with the keyboard focus.
00064    // If childId is 0 and child is NULL, no object in
00065    // this subhierarchy has the focus.
00066    // If this object has the focus, child should be 'this'.
00067    virtual wxAccStatus GetFocus( int *childId, wxAccessible **child );
00068 
00069    // Returns help text for this object or a child, similar to tooltip text.
00070    virtual wxAccStatus GetHelpText( int childId, wxString *helpText );
00071 
00072    // Returns the keyboard shortcut for this object or child.
00073    // Return e.g. ALT+K
00074    virtual wxAccStatus GetKeyboardShortcut( int childId, wxString *shortcut );
00075 
00076    // Returns the rectangle for this object (id = 0) or a child element (id > 0).
00077    // rect is in screen coordinates.
00078    virtual wxAccStatus GetLocation( wxRect& rect, int elementId );
00079 
00080    // Gets the name of the specified object.
00081    virtual wxAccStatus GetName( int childId, wxString *name );
00082 
00083    // Returns a role constant.
00084    virtual wxAccStatus GetRole( int childId, wxAccRole *role );
00085 
00086    // Gets a variant representing the selected children
00087    // of this object.
00088    // Acceptable values:
00089    // - a null variant (IsNull() returns TRUE)
00090    // - a list variant (GetType() == wxT("list"))
00091    // - an integer representing the selected child element,
00092    //   or 0 if this object is selected (GetType() == wxT("long"))
00093    // - a "void*" pointer to a wxAccessible child object
00094    virtual wxAccStatus GetSelections( wxVariant *selections );
00095 
00096    // Returns a state constant.
00097    virtual wxAccStatus GetState(int childId, long* state);
00098 
00099    // Returns a localized string representing the value for the object
00100    // or child.
00101    virtual wxAccStatus GetValue(int childId, wxString* strValue);
